title: Expertly Blending Modelmaking, Photography and Digital Compositing
description: These photographs are by Felix Alejandro Hernandez. The thing is, Hernandez isn't just a photographer, but an expert modelmaker and digital artist.His Instagram features a bunch of fun videos showing you the behind-the-scenes. In this one, he creates a sci-fi set using a combination of modelmaking, practical photography and digital skills: Plenty more to see here, and Hernandez offers courses on how he does it all here.
author: Rain Noe

html:
Expertly Blending Modelmaking, Photography and Digital Compositing

Stellar work by Felix Alejandro Hernandez

These photographs are by Felix Alejandro Hernandez.

The thing is, Hernandez isn't just a photographer, but an expert modelmaker and digital artist.


His Instagram features a bunch of fun videos showing you the behind-the-scenes. In this one, he creates a sci-fi set using a combination of modelmaking, practical photography and digital skills:

Plenty more to see here, and Hernandez offers courses on how he does it all here.
